newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-ROBERTSON MOVES FROM RANGERS TO LEEDS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ROBERTSON MOVES FROM RANGERS TO LEEDS.

text.p: Leeds United signed Scottish international full-back David Robertson from Glasgow Rangers on Tuesday for a fee of 500,000 pounds ($811,000).
It could be the start of a busy summer at Leeds who have departed for a club tour to the United States without Tony Yeboah, Carlton Palmer and Ian Rush, fuelling speculation about their future.
